Shareholder Name: AIG MEA Investments and Services Inc
Abdul Latif Hamad Mohamed Al Jabr

Description: MetLife AIG ANB Cooperative Insurance (known as: MetLife AIG ANB) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since November 2013. Anb Insurance operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Insurance Brokers. MetLife AIG ANB is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in August 2013.
Company Name: MetLife AIG ANB Cooperative Insurance Co (8011)
